parameters.name: ArbiterVSwitchId
parameters.description: The ID of the vSwitch in the arbiter zone for a multi-zone instance. The vSwitch must be in the zone specified by ArbiterZoneId. **This parameter is required if you want to create a multi-zone instance.**

parameters.name: ArbiterZoneId
parameters.description: The ID of the arbiter zone for a multi-zone instance. **This parameter is required if you want to create a multi-zone instance.**

parameters.name: ArchVersion
parameters.description:
The deployment architecture. Valid values:

- **1.0**: single zone.

- **2.0**: multi-zone Basic Edition.

- **3.0**: multi-zone High-availability Edition.

parameters.name: AutoRenewDuration
parameters.description:
The auto-renewal duration. Unit: month.

Valid values: **1** to **12**.

> This parameter is valid only when you set **AutoRenewal** to **true**.

parameters.name: AutoRenewal
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to enable auto-renewal for the instance. Valid values:

- **true**: Enable auto-renewal.

- **false**: Disable auto-renewal.

The default value is false.

> This parameter is valid only when you set **PayType** to **PREPAY**.

parameters.name: CapacityStorageSize
parameters.description: The size of the storage-optimized storage. Unit: GB.

parameters.name: CloudStorageSize
parameters.description: The size of the cloud storage. Unit: GB.

parameters.name: CloudStorageType
parameters.description:
The storage class. This parameter is not required if you select **Big Data** or **Local SSD**.

- **PerformanceStorage**: performance cloud storage

- **StandardStorage**: standard cloud storage

parameters.name: ClusterMode
parameters.description:
The instance mode. This parameter is not required.

- **BASIC**: general-purpose mode

parameters.name: ClusterPattern
parameters.description:
The cluster type. Valid value:

- **basic**: production

parameters.name: Duration
parameters.description:
The subscription duration of the instance. Valid values:

- If you set PricingCycle to **Month**, the valid values are **1** to **9**.

- If you set PricingCycle to **Year**, the valid values are **1** to **3**.

> This parameter is required only when you set PayType to **PREPAY**.

parameters.name: EnableCapacityStorage
parameters.description: Specifies whether to enable storage-optimized storage.

parameters.name: EngineList
parameters.description: The list of engine information.

parameters.name: InstanceAlias
parameters.description: The name of the instance.

parameters.name: PayType
parameters.description:
The billing method of the instance. Valid values:

- **PREPAY**: subscription.

- **POSTPAY**: pay-as-you-go.

parameters.name: PricingCycle
parameters.description:
The subscription period of the instance. Valid values:

- **Month**: The unit is month.

- **Year**: The unit is year.

> This parameter is required only when you set PayType to **PREPAY**.

parameters.name: PrimaryVSwitchId
parameters.description: The ID of the vSwitch in the primary zone for a multi-zone instance. The vSwitch must be in the zone specified by PrimaryZoneId. **This parameter is required if you want to create a multi-zone instance.**

parameters.name: PrimaryZoneId
parameters.description: The ID of the primary zone for a multi-zone instance. **This parameter is required if you want to create a multi-zone instance.**

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The ID of the region where you want to create the instance. To query the available regions, call the [DescribeRegions](~~426062~~) operation.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource group.

parameters.name: StandbyVSwitchId
parameters.description: The ID of the vSwitch in the secondary zone for a multi-zone instance. The vSwitch must be in the zone specified by StandbyZoneId. **This parameter is required if you want to create a multi-zone instance.**

parameters.name: StandbyZoneId
parameters.description: The ID of the secondary zone for a multi-zone instance. **This parameter is required if you want to create a multi-zone instance.**

parameters.name: VPCId
parameters.description: The ID of the virtual private cloud (VPC) for the instance.

parameters.name: VSwitchId
parameters.description: The ID of the vSwitch.

parameters.name: ZoneId
parameters.description: The ID of the zone for the instance.
